E AUTHORIZATION DOCUMENT AND TELEX CONFIRMATION WILL BE SEND TO YOUR BANK AND FOR YOU TO VARIFY FROM YOUR BANK AS SOON AS THE FUND HIT YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.NOTE: Please kindly state your early responseimmediately on this email:john48752003@yahoo.com
for more details on the modalities involves in this business and it is top

secret you have to keep strictly

confidential.

I WILL BE EXPRECTING YOUR URGENT COMPLIANCE AND FEED BACK.

YOURS TRULY,

DR.KOLA JOHNSON
